entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Reflection.PortableExecutable: IMAGE_DLL_CHARACTERISTICS_GUARD_CF missing from DLLCharacteristics enum #71354
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimitPartition rename Create methods #71352
  • [NativeAOT] Data Contract Serializer #71350
  • Invalid type for MakeGenericMethod is crashing the runtime #71339
  • Support for FreeBSD-arm64 #71338
  • [iOS] Deedle nuget package causes aot compiler to hang #71333
  • [runtime-coreclr pgo] nativeruntimeeventsource test fails arm32 and x86 #71331
    7.0.0
  • Application Hang and Stops responding to API calls #71320
  • Targets of variant static interface method resolution #71319
  • Test failure profiler\\rejit\\rejit\\rejit.cmd #71316
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\BitwiseOperations_ro\\BitwiseOperations_ro.cmd #71314
  • ValueTask.ConfigureAwait(false) may resume execution on a random synchronization context #71313

Closed

  • TestKeyTransKeyEncryptionAlgorithm_RoundTrip test fails for .NET Framework #71024
  • InvalidProgramException for very large struct #71335
  • OKTA Saml2 Signing Certs fail to validate in .net 6, same cert works fine in .net 3.1 #71062
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #71315
  • Always update NuGet to latest stable version #71347
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #59614
  • FileLoadException thrown while loading the assembly name #62159
  • CreateJsonPropertyInfo NullReferenceException #71296
    7.0.0
  • Internal connection fatal error when connecting from linux docker to mysql/mysql-server docker container #71055
  • Try/catch blocks for ArrayPool in System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm #71249
  • Assertion prop does not properly truncate stores to small-typed args #70607
    7.0.0
  • Using GLFW and SkiaSharp on macOS causes dotnet to quit unexpectedly #71318
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/25/2022 10:02:21 PM #71337
  • COM interop converts `VT_BSTR/NULL` variants to `null` instead of `string.Empty` #71002
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Additional Regex.EnumerateMatches/Count overloads #68959
    7.0.0
  • PGO: Assertion failed '(sizeDif == 4) || (sizeDif == 8)' #71217
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid results/assertion errors with modulo ops #70333
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: _mono_aot_corelib_eh_frame is twice is large on .NET 6 compared to legacy mono #70679
    7.0.0
  • Runtime to set default EntryPoint for [UnmanagedCallersOnly] #71303
  • [Feature Request] Allow Options service to bind config to class with parameterised ctor #71301

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crossgen2 version resilience test #71357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding AllBitsSet to IBinaryNumber Interface #71356
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Recognize the stateful marshaller shape #71355
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Delete dead code #71351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid a linear search in the GENERICPARAMCONSTRAINT table, its… #71349
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Check layout compatibility before morphing `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` into a list of promoted fields #71348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewire polymorphism metadata to the contract model #71346
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/2 #71345
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Preparation for public API in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #71332
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM64 #71328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on LA #71327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use in-tree ilasm to run test suite natively on s390x #71326
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use GenericArraySortHelper<T> on mono as well. #71325
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Type loader support for static virtual methods #71321
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Fix firefox tests #71272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup CapiHelper.Unix #71340
    area-System.Security
  • Remove some unnecessary fixed blocks #71317
    area-Meta
  • Improve allocations and startup in HashAlgorithmNames #71341
    area-System.Security
  • Move helpers for marshaller shape into separate class #71344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make sure we emit diagnostics for "unsupported" marshalling for downlevel platforms #71342
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Improve and simplify `MakeTmpArgNode` #71019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Argument tests for CreateJsonTypeInfo and CreateJsonPropertyInfo #71324
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Support `PUTARG_SPLIT(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix local assertion prop for small locals #71336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add annotations for ref fields to public API surface #71265
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix URL to runtime-assets in Capability.Security.cs #71334
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Allow more permissive forward subbing into call arguments #71161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump Helix workitem timeout for iOS Device perf scenarios #71330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Apply Auto layout to large internal structs in System.Text.Json #71329
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add Regex span startat overloads #71228
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: don't try to shorten an already short arm64 adr #71306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip export without EntryPoints from linker script #71307
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid some unnecessary signed casts #70884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `Array.Resize` in data storages #71302
    area-System.Data, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Re-enable automatic gc safe transitions in threaded wasm mode #71229
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Annotate collections.specialized to be native aot compatible #71159
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #71273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: strengthen checking of the loop table #71184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][nodejs] Fix console template running with node, to always flush the output stream before exit #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "supportsDebuggerProperties" from DAP #71148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [GDBJIT] Fix "section extending past end of file" warning #69124
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Additional policy for limiting RTT PINGs in SocketsHttpHandler #70995
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Support top-level statements in regex analyzer #71264
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: fix double reporting of some GC frame slots #71245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an ETW event for reporting some internal JIT data back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/comm stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • Improve allocations in NegotiateStreamPal #71280
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `fgMorphGetStructAddr` #71078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid OOMing in very large functions when checking LIR #71066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, .NET
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix reordering arguments when normalizing in impPopCallArgs #70992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Utilize Kernel Samepage Merging #71312
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • XSLT uses Ref.Emit #196
  • Throw when LCID marshalling is needed #171

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8: Enable private NuGet dependencies for alternative licensing #26286
  • Log the WebPublishMethod #26283
  • workload restore crashes with solution folders #26273
  • Provide overrides of Parallel.ForEachAsync which accept Task (not ValueTask) #26269
  • NativeAOT publish produces broken binary #26268

Closed

  • ProcessAWSCredentialException when running SDK on OSX #26270
  • Check native aot app does not generate deps and config files #26132
    7.0.1xx
  • Native Aot test should work on Linux #24983
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET 6.0.6: DOTNET_SYSTEM_GLOBALIZATION_INVARIANT=1 doesn't work any more #26277

PullRequests

Created

  • Update razor-compiler dependencies and re-enable flow #26290
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Don't reference SCI and SRM 5.0.0 during source-build #26289
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log the publish method used when publishing #26287
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26235
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Change linker to trim everything by default in 7.0 #26246
    Area-Infrastructure
  • implemented in-proc callbacks for dotnet operations #26155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generated constructor with invalid parameter name #62162
  • Local constant is considered unused when it's used as default parameter value for local function #62161
  • EE doesn't display `ref` fields as expected. #62157
    Backlog
  • Test ref fields in the Expression Evaluator #62156

Closed

  • IBraceCompletionService is ILanguageService, but its implementations are not exported via ExportLanguageService #61935
    17.3
  • No error reported for duplicate `ref` in lambda signature #62085
    17.3
  • Use expression-body code fix does not preserve all comments #50181
  • GetEnumerator pattern with a ref returning 'this ref' extension method #58122
    17.3
  • Add integration test for Inheritance margin #55714
    17.3
  • Revise `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` behavior when records are inherited #61991
    17.4
  • Unable to use nuget package with native binaries in Source Generator #59219
    17.3
  • IOperation nodes don't expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #53803
    17.4
  • Adjust spec quotes in ConversionBase.AddTypesParticipatingInUserDefinedConversion to incorporate abstract statics in interfaces #53798
    17.4
  • New public APIs for UTF8 String Literals #61847
  • New public APIs for Checked User-defined Operators #61846
  • The Type property from a IPropertySymbol is null / throws exception? #60380
    17.4
  • Separate `PerformanceSensitiveAnalyzers` version from `Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzeres` #58159
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle error scenarios with duplicate required fields #62172
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #62171
    Area-IDE
  • State Machine EnC follow-up #62170
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers
  • Update xunit runners to move off Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #62168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ref fields status #62167
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62164
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add LegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService for OmniSharp EA #62163
    Area-IDE
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Track used local constants in attributes #62158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Delete Skip-SymbolCheck in official build #62154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not reuse BlockSyntax if there are attributes #62153
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unneeded LocalizableStringWithArguments #62150
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Annotate implementations of IPointerTypeSymbol #39203
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, Next
  • Annotate implementations of IPreprocessingSymbol #39201
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, Next
  • Remove 17.1 from PublishData.json #62166
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge features/ref-fields #62155
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62165
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62160
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid intermediary allocation in Incremental Driver #62089
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add compliance pipeline for running APIScan #61905
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Issue/50181 #62101
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Allow `delegate*<...>? ` to be scanned/parsed and add diagnostic to binder #62104
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use syntaxtrees in incremental processing to avoid unnecessary work #62071
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move to a shared stopwatch in the incremental generator #62134
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add Integration tests for Inheritance margin #62047
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cover additional cases where nullable directives can be removed #62043
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add members to PythiaCompletionProviderBase to move IntelliCode off internal APIs #62118
    Area-IDE, Next
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Adjust spec quotes in ConversionBase.AddTypesParticipatingInUserDefinedConversion to incorporate abstract statics in interfaces #62076
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Standardize references to the UTF-8 term in code and comments/documentation #62074
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • Separate out connection failures #62136
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62175
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62174
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #62173
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cover module naming style under class #62141
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • EnC: Log more info to in-memory buffer to simplify dump analysis #62070
    Area-Interactive
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Inheritance completions massive improvement #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow to forward obsolete types without any diagnostics. #62127
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix top-level activation for Move Static Members #62103
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Minor lazy diagnostic info refactoring #62091
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix reading scheme-specific options from config #42454
    7.0-preview6
  • Set `DefaultScheme` in configuration from user-jwts tool #42453
    7.0-preview6
  • JwtBearer authn scheme is reading signing key from configuration root rather than scheme section #42450
    7.0-preview7
  • Allow configuring virtualization spacer element type #42449
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods to M.A.Builder namespace #42445
    7.0-preview7
  • NavigationManager change URL without redirection #42443
    Backlog
  • Hot reload not work for combination of static render and wasm #42439
    Discussions
  • Allow [FromQuery] to work with simple objects in Minimal API. #42438
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorWasmHome_UseOfColor:Only underline used to differentiate the link for "Brief Survey" from normal text. #42437
    7.0-preview7
  • Blazor app is not working with custom extension in URL @page #42436
  • BindConverter throws exception on parse failure #42435
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Better error for "Attempting to return wrong pooled instance" #42433

Closed

  • gRPC transcoding public API #40792
    7.0-preview5
  • Update React project template to React v18.2 #42024
    7.0-preview7
  • Update Angular project template to use Angular v14 #42022
    7.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] How to get the pasted content from Blazor `onpaste` native event #14133
    Backlog
  • SignalR Stop connection immediately after Send won't always deliver the Send #42444
  • Base grid component #37908
    7.0-preview6
  • Building assets using MSBuild & NPM needs further clarification #42409
  • Quarantine E2E culture-aware tests #41425
    .NET 7 Planning
  • css isolation, ::deep behaves incorrectly for .class::deep > element #42432
  • [JSInterop] Bug in DotNet.createJSObjectReference #42423

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify the current agent demands and VS version #42460
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow file middlewares to run if there's an endpoint with a null request delegate #42458
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Updated VS workload manifests to Windows SDK 19041 #42457
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix logging conditions for additional request headers #42456
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix up reading auth schemes and setting default scheme #42452
  • Update MouseEventArgs to include MovementX, MovementY #42451
    area-blazor
  • Throw from OnConnected and OnDisconnected when using client results #42447
    area-signalr
  • Virtualization enhancements #42446
    area-blazor, api-suggestion, 7.0-preview7

Merged

  • Backport split Blazor templates into 2 projects #42459
    tell-mode
  • Apply remaining gRPC API changes #42422
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview7
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.7.22327.3 #42455
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Bump node-fetch from 2.6.1 to 2.6.7 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #42427
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `86add13` to `5376968` #42440
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Unquarantine component E2E tests that were quarantined because of an SDK issue #41494
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42420
    area-mvc
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Backport custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42383
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add message type resolver #42428
    area-grpc
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Change return value type from HResult to int to avoid crash on Linux x86 #3129

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView is incompatible on Shell tabbar pages on Android #8366
  • Visibility binding not resize and rearrange items inside a vertical stack layout/grid/stack layout #8365
  • Slider Thumb Wrong in iOS, OK on Windows #8364
  • maui debug fails on a file that does not exist #8362
  • `RadialGradientBrush` with `Center` rendering is broken on Windows #8361
  • MAUI won't build with Preview 17.3 #8360
  • Failed to launch android application maui with the provided template project #8359
  • Shell.Current.GotoAsync works on Simulator but Does not work on iPad #8358
  • I cannot run a new MAUI blazor project on windows. #8357
  • MAUI on VS2022 (community preview) 17.3.0 preview 2.0 Content Page Title #8356
  • Project MAUI Title Color white and MenuItem icon color in black insteed of white #8355
  • MAUI Template manifest invalid - not replacing $placeholders$ and no Capabilities available. #8354
  • VS 2022: Unable to debug Maui Windows applications: "Access is denied" #8353
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.3 Preview 2 - MAUI Comet template doesn't compile #8352
  • Orange horizontal strip in tabbed page with hamburger navigation #8349
  • SwipeView SwipeItemView Layout error #8343
  • MVVM binding doen't work properly for int types #8342
  • Windows Shell Flyout Issue (On Scroll Exception Break) #8341
  • [Android] Label HorizontalTextAlignment not correctly set #8339
  • CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand Invalid #8338

Closed

  • MVVM ObservableCollection SelectedItem = null = Exception #8329
  • Cannot run unpackaged Windows app - MAUI 6.04 #8186
  • Shell TabBar Page Navigation in Appearing causes Page to Raise Appearing twice #6716
    6.0-sr2
  • Label not getting resized to the change in Text length on Android resurfaced again in 6.0.400-preview #8028
    6.0-sr2
  • MAUI : LogMessage are not showing up anywhere #7821
    .NET 7
  • [WinUI] Error deploying Sample.SingleProject in MainPage.xaml, "A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI." #8126
    6.0-sr2
  • Can't enable Keychain on entitlements.plist #8308
  • .NET MAUI Animation doesn't work on Android platform #8340
  • IOS ShellContent Icon property disables page navigation #7962

PullRequests

Created

  • Return unknown if not on UI Thread for WinUI #8368
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #8347
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • [X] Pass the parent scopes to DataContext #8345
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix issue using Entry IsPassword with IsReadOnly property #8344
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22326.1 #8348
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add Debug logger to MAUI templates #8180
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Update macios #8350
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • Fix typo #8336
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SefContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0-sr2
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix crash using Shadows on ListView ViewCell #8269
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, fatal, area/ListView, 6.0-sr3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • renaming entities while scaffolding in EF Core 6 #28329
  • "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sqlite_schema;" always returns null #28321

Closed

  • Intermittent Behavior With Linq .Any() / AnyAsync() #28311
  • Sqlite Unique Key #28324
  • GroupJoin leads to exception #28319
  • SqlClient version in EF Core. #28320
  • GroupJoin leads to exception #28318
  • Sum in GroupBy fails with Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery #28310

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for Dictionary literals #28330
  • Testing #28328
  • Disable SQLite tests on OSX #28327
  • Bump NetTopologySuite from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 #28326
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28325
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for List literals #28212
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Custom aggregate translations #28110

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update the installer table for preview 6 #14044
  • Upgrade newtonsoft version #14043

Merged

  • Add more detailed source-build instructions to README #14038
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #14040

Updated

  • [release/6.0.3xx] manually updated MicrosoftDotNetCommonItemTemplatesPackageVersion #14003
